Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.

Mix the brown sugar, white sugar, and butter in a large bowl until smooth. Add the eggs one at a time, stirring well after each. Add vanilla, salt, baking soda, then blend in ground pecans and flour. Gently fold in the chocolate chips. Be careful not to overmix once the flour is added.
Spoon teaspoonfuls of cookie dough onto ungreased baking sheets, ensuring they are about 2 inches apart.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned around the edges. Cool on the baking sheets before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
